alert.note: Alert for Andrews; Gaines; Loving; Lower Brewster County; Pecos; Presidio Valley; Reeves County Plains; Terrell; Van Horn and Highway 54 Corridor; Ward; Winkler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued March 01 at 3:48AM CST until March 03 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM CST /8 AM MST/ THIS MORNING TO 9 PM CST /8 PM MST/ THIS EVENING... ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING THROUGH THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. For the High Wind Watch, west winds 40 to 50 mph with gusts up to 75 mph possible. * WHERE...Portions of southeast New Mexico and southwest and western Texas. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, from 9 AM CST /8 AM MST/ this morning to 9 PM CST /8 PM MST/ this evening. For the High Wind Watch, from Thursday morning through Thursday evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
